data.title: First edition, first printing
data.meta_description: New York: Grove Press, 1964 . First edition, first printing. 8vo. Original red cloth; dust jacket designed by Roy Kuhlman. Clipped jacket with short internal tear along front joint, nick/loss at end of spine and top of rear panel, a few other short tears, yellow sticker on inner front flap. Item #401645
data.text:
BURROUGHS, William S.

Nova Express

New York: Grove Press, [1964]. First edition, first printing. 8vo. Original red cloth; dust jacket designed by Roy Kuhlman. Clipped jacket with short internal tear along front joint, nick/loss at end of spine and top of rear panel, a few other short tears, yellow sticker on inner front flap. Item #401645
